name: Martial Peak
author: Momo (莫默)
tagline: Rise from obscurity to the summit of the Martial Dao.
annotation: The path to the Martial Peak is one of loneliness and solitude—an endless quest where the heights are bitterly cold. Only by growing through adversity, surviving on the brink, and remaining unyielding can one glimpse the ultimate Martial Dao.
Yang Kai, a lowly sweeper and trial disciple of Lingxiao Pavilion, chances upon a wordless black book. From that moment he steps onto the boundless road of cultivation.
Among the most‑read Chinese web novels of its era, it topped mobile charts in mid‑2014 with tens of millions of views and later spawned both manhua and donghua adaptations.
